8b2219ac-3e73-4384-8126-b10251335787.name: Diffuse
8b2219ac-3e73-4384-8126-b10251335787.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

c903b568-32b0-496b-837d-81651d01af27.name: Homogenous
c903b568-32b0-496b-837d-81651d01af27.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

bfc781d4-0712-46a7-a252-b83d934dad28.name: No Blood
bfc781d4-0712-46a7-a252-b83d934dad28.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

2818d005-b858-4e14-b79c-519d609b11dc.name: No Brain
2818d005-b858-4e14-b79c-519d609b11dc.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

8e1202ee-148f-4331-939b-fa3264002db2.name: No Eyes
8e1202ee-148f-4331-939b-fa3264002db2.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

a02a159c-d797-4827-8722-ad901a50394f.name: No Head
a02a159c-d797-4827-8722-ad901a50394f.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

912eca00-a087-4400-b8d2-0b43bf4ca351.name: No Neck
912eca00-a087-4400-b8d2-0b43bf4ca351.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

66ed8319-25d3-4976-a913-db6919ef9b4a.name: No Vitals
66ed8319-25d3-4976-a913-db6919ef9b4a.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

df982264-cc8d-49a7-b4d1-7977822591ab.name: Unliving
df982264-cc8d-49a7-b4d1-7977822591ab.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
